completeQuest(uint256).details: For daily quests: only once per day. For other quests: only once ever per user.      After minting XP, badges.awardBadges(...) is called to attempt awarding badges.

params.description: Longer description for the quest UI
params.isDaily: Whether quest is a daily (once per day) quest
params.title: Short title for the quest

getQuestsInRange(uint256,uint256).details: `start` and `end` are quest ids (1-based). Reverts if start == 0 or end < start.

returns.result: Array of Quest structs for existing quests in the range

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.active: True to activate, false to deactivate

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

completeQuest(uint256).notice: Complete a quest and receive XP reward.

completedOnce(address,uint256).notice: user => questId => completed (for non-daily quests where only once)

getQuestsInRange(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieve quests in a (inclusive) id range. Useful for pagination.

lastDailyCheckinDay(address).notice: user => last daily check-in day index (timestamp / 1 days)

nextQuestId().notice: Next quest ID to assign (starts at 1)

recoverERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Recover ERC20 tokens accidentally sent to this contract (except XP token)

recoverETH(address,uint256).notice: Recover any ETH accidentally sent to this contract

setXPToken(address).notice: Update the QuestXP token contract (for migrations)

totalCompleted(address).notice: user => total quests completed (including daily completions)
